# Match file name with string ID
```{r}
library(stringr)
id_list <- c('20221206_01', '20221206_02')

conc_occ_count <- matrix(ncol = 1, nrow = length(id_list))
for ( i in 1:length(id_list)){
  df <- as.data.frame(str_count(Chains$V1, id_list[i]))
  occ_count <- colSums(df != 0)
  conc_occ_count[i] <- occ_count
}

```
